page.title: 18CURRENT CONCERNS KILWINNING
page.content: When Kilwinning became part of IRVINE NEW TOWN people were and still are afraid that the town would lose its identity.After all it was an{ANCIENT {ROYAL BURGH-- }the same as IRVINE. There is a strong feeling to revive and make known the history of the place.PEOPLE feel that the town of IRVINE has better leisure facilities and a bigger variety oF shops.{ {KILWINNING has NO swimming pool, {theatre,ice-rink,cinema or sports {facilities on the large scale. UNEMPLOYMENT is very high and people are concerned about the reduction in the number of places of work.Many factories employ women rather than men.There is no full time police station.
